metadata.title: CVE-2024-26936 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:validate request buffer size in smb2_allocate_rsp_buf() The response buffershould be allocated in smb2_allocate_rsp_buf before validating request. Butthe fields in payload as well as smb2 header is used insmb2_allocate_rsp_buf(). This patch add simple buffer size validation toavoid potencial out-of-bounds in request buffer.
